caption.center: Lillie E. Cross, administratrix of the estate of Robert Cross deceased,

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Second District.

opinion.posture:
Assumpsit for payment on land contract. Judgment for plaintiff.
Appeal from the Circuit Court of Kankakee county; the Hon. Arthur W. DeSelm, Judge, presiding. Heard in this court at the April term, 1926.
opinion.attorneys: C.M. Granger, for appellant. Walter C. Schneider, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Justice Jett delivered the opinion of the court.
